Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 12:06:29
Folder: C17D8W4 - business travel update, psychological safety as the key to unlocking organisational effectiveness, internal jo
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C17D8W4_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-02 15:36
Subject: Business Travel Update, Psychological Safety as the Key to Unlocking Organisational Effectiveness, Internal Job Opportunities & A Look Back at Our Delegates Experience at One Young World Summit
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hqgfOr4ab0Ss9cE7euhE8w/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hqgfOr4ab0Ss9cE7euhE8w/550450/5DD1232732CF1D37DD032DBFC2431B69/pexels-camcasey-1157255-2.jpg> 	

BUSINESS TRAVEL UPDATE


Temporary suspension on all non-essential travel for team members will be put in place until further notice to and from Jordan and Lebanon.

Essential travel will be assessed on a case-by-case basis. We encourage our team members to utilize remote working options whenever possible. 

Additionally, please check your booked flights since some other destinations might have been rescheduled or cancelled by Airlines.

For any support to cancel or reschedule your upcoming trips, please reach out to your Business Travel Team. We will be closely monitoring the situation and will provide regular updates as circumstances evolve.

We will be closely monitoring the situation and will provide regular updates as circumstances evolve.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hqgfOr4ab0Ss9cE7euhE8w/545165/89D49CDE2A1BF478CAB98F9F126897A6/nuggets-06.png> 	

PSYCHOLOGICAL SAFETY UNLOCKING ORGANISATIONAL EFFECTIVENESS

Read about Psychological Safety as the Key to Unlocking Organisational Effectiveness, focusing on two of the nine outcomes of organisational effectiveness measured by McKinsey’s Organisational Health Index "Authoritative Leadership is Obsolete," and "Help Individuals be at their individual best every day." 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hqgfOr4ab0Ss9cE7euhE8w/550452/0CB69AA1F1487882BFA1C87EE8B03100/uae_boh9-3.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hqgfOr4ab0Ss9cE7euhE8w/545142/68ED92011BD588A3A59276CC3EC90610/nuggets-12.png> 	

INTERNAL JOB OPPORTUNITIES

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hqgfOr4ab0Ss9cE7euhE8w/550094/FCA5F56C95C61A8B5E0455945A9337D8/untitled-design-2024-06-27t121658-383.png> 	
Visit our Chalhoub Career Site for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!

B8A540801F3964/untitled-design-2024-06-27t121637-459.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hqgfOr4ab0Ss9cE7euhE8w/545210/479E119BAEB11C373B83D926A0BF974C/nuggets-15.png> 	

A LOOK BACK AT OUR DELEGATES EXPERIENCE AT ONE YOUNG WORLD

At this year's One Young World Summit, nine of our delegates engaged in impactful discussions, workshops, and collaborative sessions aimed at finding innovative solutions to pressing global issues. The summit provided valuable learning opportunities, with young ambassadors sharing ideas and experiences that can inspire positive change. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f58946%252fa-look-back-at-our-delegates-experience-at-one-young-world-summit-2024%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWUoXATi%252bEGiL8R10CyeolsOQWcQc0F0F4aJd770id5zToFQ2GofVW4jdsfLejSQRd7MlSgmNnctQUOOBD8Gfc%252f85naVzuJAz4%252bjcwbX%252bxj0OYemK3j9hoD0lX%252fK4ywiZMd2FPNjiSr0O3HDsCdJr0ez6lzmciKoZopPVws4w7IXzl2YPQXGlO9w%252fXrYqf1r1s%252bm76hdAqIeOE9cB4z5Z%252f8r7YbVwEo73oDg%252bTEUW46SF&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1f5e5706917848a845b808dce2d67b6f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638634658028756807%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Epn2CiGzdjF107Mg26kVNcsPazdgJhzrQYdVjLRn4go%3D&reserved=0>
